metadata.name: HackTool - RemoteKrbRelay SMB Relay Secrets Dump Module Indicators
metadata.comment: Detects the creation of file with specific names used by RemoteKrbRelay SMB Relay attack module.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM file_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND (endswith(lower(file.path), lower(':\\windows\\temp\\sam.tmp')) OR endswith(lower(file.path), lower(':\\windows\\temp\\sec.tmp')) OR endswith(lower(file.path), lower(':\\windows\\temp\\sys.tmp'))))

output.summary: Detects the creation of file with specific names used by RemoteKrbRelay SMB Relay attack module.
